pages.text: $(li)The Shroomlight is a source light block that can be found in the Crimson Forest and Warped Fungus biomes.$(br)$(li)Warped Toads may drop them on death.$(br)$(li)They can be used to craft Crimson Lanterns and Lamps in a Crafting Table.
Insert a picture of a Shroomlight in the Nether
